title: Score a Free USB-C Charger When You Buy a Top-Rated EcoFlow Power Bank This Labor Day Weekend
description: Never stress about running out of a charge thanks to this sweet Labor Day deal on a handy power bank.
content:
EcoFlow makes some of our favorite portable batteries and chargers. Its brand-new Rapid series includes compact, fast-charging power banks designed to keep all your devices running on the go. For Labor Day, EcoFlow is bundling in a free charger when you buy from the series.

I found that EcoFlow has set up a tiered promo depending on how much you spend. If you spend at least $59 on Amazon on Rapid series products, you’ll receive a free 30W EcoFlow wall charger. If you step up to $139 or more on Amazon, EcoFlow sweetens the deal with a free 65W fast charger instead. Both gifts are added automatically once you meet the spend threshold, so you’re getting an essential charging accessory for free while picking up new portable power gear.

EcoFlow’s Rapid power banks are designed for people who want compact, fast, and reliable charging when they’re away from an outlet. The lineup includes different capacities to suit different needs, whether that’s keeping a smartphone alive during travel, charging a tablet between meetings, or even giving a laptop an emergency top-up.

Hey, did you know? CNET Deals texts are free, easy and save you money.

With USB-C Power Delivery support, these packs can charge devices quickly and efficiently, which makes them stand out in a crowded market of slower, bulkier power banks. And there's no better way to take advantage of this than with a free USB-C charger included.

We like that EcoFlow isn’t just another brand jumping into portable power -- the brand already has a strong reputation with their larger home backup batteries and solar generators, and this new line extends that reliability into everyday carry gear. Features like pass-through charging and high-speed output make the Rapid line practical for daily use, whether you’re commuting, traveling, or working remotely.

The compact designs also mean they’ll slip easily into a backpack, messenger bag or even a jacket pocket. If you’re in the market for a portable charger, this promo is an especially easy way to stock up. We’ve seen plenty of brands charge extra for wall adapters, but EcoFlow is bundling them in for free if you jump on the deal.

This deal stands out because EcoFlow is offering a meaningful freebie -- either a 30W or 65W fast charger -- just for buying into its new Rapid lineup. Portable batteries are always useful, but getting an extra high-quality wall charger bundled in saves you money and makes the deal much more valuable.

Since these promos are tied to spending thresholds and are only live for Labor Day, it’s a great time to grab one if you’ve been considering a new power bank.
summary: EcoFlow is offering a free USB-C charger to customers who purchase its Rapid series products for Labor Day. If you spend at least $59 on Amazon on Rapid products, you will receive a free 30W EcoFlow wall charger. If more than $139 on Amazon, the company will offer a free 65W fast charger. These gifts are added automatically once you reach the threshold. The Rapid line is designed for daily use and features pass-through charging and high-speed output. The deal stands out as EcoFlow is providing a meaningful freebie for buying into its new Rapid lineup.
shortSummary: EcoFlow’s new Rapid series of power banks offer free USB-C chargers for most purchases, with additional discounts if you exceed $59.

scraped_sources.text:
Ecoflow has been on our list of the best portable power stations for some time now. When we reviewed the Ecoflow Delta Mini, we named it the best portable power station for camping because of its combination of basic functionality, capacity and price. Unfortunately, it's been out of stock more often than not lately and has faced stiff competition from newcomers, so it shouldn't be a surprise that EcoFlow has a brand new portable power station lineup that uses its proprietary X-Core 3.0 technology that allows for faster charging speeds and higher energy appliances in a smaller, quieter form factor.
EcoFlow River 3 Series
EcoFlow offers the River 3 and River 3 Plus portable Gallium Nitride power stations as successors to its more entry-level River 2 series. Both are fairly compact, about 30% smaller than competitors for their capacity. The River 3 has a capacity of 245 watt-hours with dimensions of 10 by 8.1 by 4.4 inches and weighing in at 7.7 pounds.
By EcoFlow's estimates, it should be able to run a Wi-Fi router for 30.8 hours and a fan for 6.6 hours, giving you an idea of runtime. Two AC outlets support 300 watts total, but they can boost to 600W with something ExoFlow calls X-Boost to run higher-wattage appliances. There are also two USB-A ports, one USB-C port and a car outlet.
The larger EcoFlow River 3 Plus will cost you more (price still unspecified), but it'll also be more capacious to make up for it. It has a 286Wh capacity, measures 9.2 by 8.8 by 5.7 inches and weighs 9.4 pounds. You get three AC outlets that support 600W total, but it can boost to 1200W. There are also two USB-A ports, 1 USB-C port and a car outlet.
Interestingly, the River 3 Plus battery expansion gives you up to 858Wh by adding two extra batteries that connect with Pogo Pins. The additional batteries can significantly increase the runtime depending on what you have hooked up, with a fridge lasting 1.6 hours and a 600W desktop running for 1 hour. Both power stations can double as a UPS, with the River 3 providing a 20-millisecond switchover when it detects sudden power loss and the River 3 Plus doing even better at 10 milliseconds.
The River 3 will be available for purchase starting September 10, while the River 3 Plus will be available for preorder starting November 1.
EcoFlow Delta 3 Series
The Delta 3 and Delta 3 Plus are EcoFlow's higher-end models, meaning they'll cost more than the River 3 but likely less than the Delta Pro 3. They also have more capacity to keep you running longer and some smart features, including an app that can help manage and optimize power. With the Delta 3 Plus, you get a total capacity of 1024Wh and AC outlets rated to 1800W total, with surge to 3600W and X-Boost to 2200W. This results in heftier dimensions and more weight than the River, measuring 15.67 by 7.87 by 11.18 inches.
What makes the Delta 3 especially unique is all the different ways you can charge it. Since there's an AC input outlet, you can connect it to a car charger, generator and a mix of AC and solar. The 800W alternator charger can charge it to full in 1.3 hours, while a gas generator can charge it to full in 56 minutes. Hybrid charging with AC input and attached solar panels can also top you up in 56 minutes. Like other portable power stations in the lineup, there's a built-in UPS with 10-millisecond takeover. You also have the option of adding additional batteries.
The Delta 3 Plus can be preordered starting September 10 and the Delta 3 on October 1.
EcoFlow RAPID Magnetic Power Bank
The Magnetic Power Bank is a bit different from what EcoFlow normally offers, but it reflects iPhone users' demand for MagSafe-supported chargers. There are two RAPID-branded chargers with high-density cells, one at 5,000 milliamp hours and another at 10,000mAh. These are mostly the standard MagSafe chargers with Power Delivery 3.0 and Qi 2 certification. They'll snap to the back of your compatible iPhone, offering 15W fast wireless charging and 30W/65W cable charging with the built-in USB-C cable.
The 5,000mAh battery will be available immediately, while the 10,000mAh will come to market on November 1.
EcoFlow Power Kit 5kVA 48V System
Last but by no means least is the PowerKits power system designed for RVs that go off the grid. The system requires installation but is modular and supports different RV types, including B-Vans, Class A and fifth wheels. It has an expandable capacity of up to 45kwH and supports fast charging via alternator, solar and AC power, making it potentially incredibly useful for vanlife enthusiasts. According to EcoFlow, it should be capable of running two rooftop air conditioners and multiple high-power appliances.
Power kits will be available for preorder starting October 15.

I spend every day trying to find deals that really save you money. And with Labor Day weekend coming up in just a few days, you'll want to know where to shop and what the best deals are. And we mean genuine savings, not fake reductions that will barely save you anything. My team and I are tracking and personally handpicking sales at top retailers, like Amazon, Walmart, Best Buy and more, for our CNET Deals text subscribers. We'll deliver the best sales to your phone, helping you score must-have items with minimal effort at the best price possible.
Why would you go through the effort of finding the best sales when we're here to do it for you? We do it really well, and for free. Signing up for the CNET Deals text group — scroll down — takes less than a minute. It's safe and trusted, and you can opt out anytime. The service is free, and the goal is to help save you money on products you'll love.
More about our deals text curation
This is the good stuff, not just "discounts" on prices that were artificially inflated last week. We're vetting every deal to ensure the price is what it says it is and that the product is in stock when we send the text. We send out a Deal of the Day, and during major shopping events we'll send two texts a day on standout sales. And if we find multiple deals under an ultra-low price, we'll hook you up with multiple deals in a single text.
With daily deals texting, my team and I apply the same care as we do across all of CNET, just in a bite-sized format. You'll receive the same level of deep research, the same confirmation that these discounts are legitimate and useful. And there's no AI here pulling the strings. We're a passionate, dedicated team of people finding actual deals. If we uncover something interesting for an affordable price — usually under $50 with a significant discount — you'll hear about it so you never miss a great deal. If we find a cool thing on sale, we share that discovery. It's truly as simple as that. I hope you join us.

argos_summary: EcoFlow’s new Rapid portable battery line is on sale for Labor Day, offering a free 30W wall charger with purchases over $59 and a free 65W fast charger for orders over $139 on Amazon. The Rapid series features USB‑C Power Delivery, pass‑through charging, and compact designs suitable for travel and remote work. EcoFlow also highlights its broader product range, including River and Delta portable power stations and a magnetic power bank, emphasizing fast charging and expandable capacity. The promotion is limited to Labor Day and is automatically applied at checkout when spend thresholds are met.
